Package com.vectorprint.configuration

classes that support flexible configuration of applications

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Configurable<P extends Map>
    A Configurable object should be initialized by a SettingsProvider.
    EnhancedMap
    This interface describes map enhancements for typing support, multiple value support, key based help and preparing keys and values before addition.
    PropertyHelp
    A suggested way for providing help for properties.
    SettingsProvider<P extends Map>
    A settings provider is responsible for providing configuration information to a configuarble object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArgumentParser
    Helper for yielding key value pairs, based on (command line) arguments
    PropertyHelpImpl  
    VectorPrintProperties
    Enhances Java Map with typing, debugging info, property source, overriding properties from the command line arguments.
